common_questions.research_focus: Zhibo's research focuses on LLM Post-Training and Reinforcement Learning, specifically investigating how human feedback (RLHF) and verifiable rewards (RLVR) can create more intelligent, trustworthy, and reason-oriented AI systems.
common_questions.recent_work: His recent work includes 'Beyond Noisy-TVs' accepted at ICLR 2026, which addresses noise-robust exploration in reinforcement learning using learning progress monitoring.
common_questions.education_path: Zhibo earned his B.S. and M.S. in Computer Engineering from Purdue University, and is currently pursuing his Ph.D. in EECS at UC Merced under Prof. Wan Du.
common_questions.best_contact: For academic inquiries, please email Zhibo at zhou6@ucmerced.edu
